II.ii.2.C.2.c
.
Filing of Folder Flashes
Use the table below to file flashes in
reverse
filing order to allow the flash to be folded back and remain on top of all subsequent material.
Flash
Location
VA Form 22-6564, Claims Folder Flash – Vocational Rehabilitation Trainee
Left flap of the paper claims folder
VA Form 20-6879, Overpayment Flash
Left flap of the paper claims or deceased Veteran’s claims folder
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Locked Files Folder Maintenance
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
